title: Road Event Feature (GeoJSON Feature)
description: The container object for a specific TDx road event; an instance of a GeoJSON Feature (originally developed for the WZDx Specification)

id.description: A unique identifier issued by the data feed provider to identify the TDx road event

type.description: The GeoJSON object type; must be 'Feature'

DetourRoadEvent.title: Detour Road Event
DetourRoadEvent.description: Descibes a detour on a roadway

beginning_cross_street.description: Name or number of the nearest cross street along the roadway where the event begins

ending_cross_street.description: Name or number of the nearest cross street along the roadway where the event ends

beginning_milepost.description: The linear distance measured against a milepost marker along a roadway where the event begins

ending_milepost.description: The linear distance measured against a milepost marker along a roadway where the event ends

start_date.description: The UTC date and time (formatted according to RFC 3339, Section 5.6) when the road event begins (e.g. 2020-11-03T19:37:00Z)

end_date.description: The UTC date and time (formatted according to RFC 3339, Section 5.6) when the road event ends (e.g. 2020-11-03T19:37:00Z)

is_start_date_verified.description: Indicates if work has been confirmed to have started, such as from a person or field device

is_end_date_verified.description: Indicates if work has been confirmed to have ended, such as from a person or field device

IncidentRoadEvent.title: Incident Road Event
IncidentRoadEvent.description: Describes incidents or events that close or restrict the use of a road segment

types_of_incident.description: A list of one or more incident types describing the cause of closure or restriction

beginning_cross_street.description: Name or number of the nearest cross street along the roadway where the event begins

ending_cross_street.description: Name or number of the nearest cross street along the roadway where the event ends

beginning_milepost.description: The linear distance measured against a milepost marker along a roadway where the event begins

ending_milepost.description: The linear distance measured against a milepost marker along a roadway where the event ends

is_start_position_verified.description: Indicates if the start position (first geometric coordinate pair) is based on actual reported data from a GPS-equipped device that measured the location of the start of the work zone

is_end_position_verified.description: Indicates if the end position (last geometric coordinate pair) is based on actual reported data from a GPS-equipped device that measured the location of the end of the work zone

start_date.description: The UTC date and time (formatted according to RFC 3339, Section 5.6) when the road event begins (e.g. 2020-11-03T19:37:00Z)

end_date.description: The UTC date and time (formatted according to RFC 3339, Section 5.6) when the road event ends (e.g. 2020-11-03T19:37:00Z)

is_start_date_verified.description: Indicates if work has been confirmed to have started, such as from a person or field device

is_end_date_verified.description: Indicates if work has been confirmed to have ended, such as from a person or field device

reduced_speed_limit_kph.description: If applicable, the reduced speed limit posted within the road event, in kilometers per hour

restrictions.description: A list of zero or more restrictions applying to the road event

lanes.description: A list of individual lanes within a road event (roadway segment)

RestrictionRoadEvent.title: Restriction Road Event
RestrictionRoadEvent.description: A road event describing a section of roadway and the limitations of how that section can be used

restrictions.description: A list of zero or more restrictions applying to the road event

lanes.description: A list of individual lanes within a road event (roadway segment)

RoadEventCoreDetails.title: Road Event Core Details
RoadEventCoreDetails.description: The core details of an event occurring on a roadway (i.e. a road event) that is shared by all types of road events

data_source_id.description: Identifies the data source from which the road event data is sourced from

road_names.description: A list of publicly known names of the road on which the event occurs. This may include the road number designated by a jurisdiction such as a county, state or interstate (e.g. I-5, VT 133)

description.description: Short free text description of the road event

creation_date.description: The UTC date and time (formatted according to RFC 3339, Section 5.6) when the road event was created (e.g. 2020-11-03T19:37:00Z)

update_date.description: The UTC date and time (formatted according to RFC 3339, Section 5.6) when the road event was last updated (e.g. 2020-11-03T19:37:00Z)

Relationship.title: Relationship
Relationship.description: Identifies both sequential and hierarchical relationships between road events and other entities. For example, a relationship can be used to link multiple road events to a common 'parent', such as a project or phase, or identify a sequence of road events

first.description: Indicates the first (can be multiple) road event in a sequence of road events by RoadEventFeature 'id'

next.description: Indicates the next (can be multiple) road event in a sequence of road events by RoadEventFeature 'id'

parents.description: Indicates entities that the road event with this relationship is a part of, such as a work zone project or phase. Values can but do not have to correspond to a TDx entity

children.description: Indicates entities that are part of the road event with this relationship, such as a detour or piece of equipment. Values can but do not have to correspond to a TDx entity

TypeOfIncident.title: Type of Incident
TypeOfIncident.description: The TypeOfIncident object describes an event that causes disruptions to expected operations

description.description: Short free text desciption of the type of incident

Lane.title: Lane
Lane.description: An individual lane within a road event

order.description: The position (index) of the lane in sequence on the roadway, where '1' represents the left-most lane

lane_number.description: ***DEPRECATED*** The number assigned to the lane to help identify its position. Flexible, but usually used for regular, driveable lanes

restrictions.description: A list of zero or more restrictions specific to the lane

Restriction.title: Restriction
Restriction.description: A restriction on a roadway or lane, including type and value

EventType.title: Road Event Type Enumerated Type
EventType.description: The type of TDx road event

Direction.title: Direction Enumerated Type
Direction.description: The direction for a road event based on standard naming for US roads; indicates the direction the traffic flow regardless of the real heading angle

IncidentCategory.title: Incident Category Enumerated Type
IncidentCategory.description: Categories of incidents causing disruptions to expected operations

IncidentType.title: Incident Type Enumerated Type
IncidentType.description: Descriptions of the incidents causing disruptions to expected operations

RestrictionType.title: Restriction Type Enumerated Type
RestrictionType.description: The type of vehicle restriction on a roadway

LaneStatus.title: Lane Status Enumerated Type
LaneStatus.description: The status of the lane for the traveling public

LaneType.title: Lane Type Enumerated Type
LaneType.description: An indication of the type of lane or shoulder

UnitOfMeasurement.title: Unit of Measurement Enumerated Type
UnitOfMeasurement.description: Unit of measurement, used when providing a unit to accompany a value

VehicleImpact.title: Vehicle Impact Enumerated Type
VehicleImpact.description: The impact to vehicular lanes along a single road in a single direction
